name: Sentiment Analysis Web App
description: Built a sentiment analysis tool using Naive Bayes Classifier. Designed frontend with HTML/CSS and developed backend in Python. Achieved ~85% accuracy on test data.

name: Email Sending System
description: Developed an email application with multi-user functionality using Tkinter and SMTP. Enabled real-time messaging.

name: Banking Management System
description: Created a desktop app using Python Tkinter for managing user accounts and transactions. Implemented login, deposit, and withdrawal functionalities.

name: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio site built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Fully responsive and deployed on Render.
